summary: This is an email chain regarding planning for a visit by the Deputy Attorney General (DAG) to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The draft agenda includes a planned update on the Epstein investigation during a meeting with the office's executive team.

events.title: Email Planning DAG Visit to SDNY
events.description: Email correspondence planning a visit by the Deputy Attorney General to the SDNY, including a draft agenda with a scheduled update on the Epstein investigation.

locations: U.S. Attorneys Office for the Southern District of New York, One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A visit by the Deputy Attorney General (DAG) to the SDNY was being planned in January 2020.
The draft agenda for the visit included a planned update on the Epstein investigation during a meeting with the SDNY executive team.
The email indicates the Epstein investigation was an active topic of discussion at high levels of the Department of Justice in early 2020.
The correspondence shows coordination between the DAG's office and the SDNY regarding case briefings.
